wikipedia_page.main: Patrick Miller (21 September 1907 – 2 December 1993) was an English cricketer. He played first-class cricket for Bengal, Europeans and Madras.

response: * Patrick Miller of Dalswinton (1731–1815), organised an early experimental steamboat
* Patrick Miller (politician) (died 1845), Scottish soldier and politician, MP for Dumfries Burghs 1790–96
